request.description:
The `POST /market/add-auction` endpoint is used to add a new auction to the market.

### Request Body

- The request should include the following parameters:
    
    - `auction_title` (text): The title of the auction.
        
    - `starting_price` (text): The starting price of the auction.
        
    - `end_date` (text): The end date of the auction.
        
    - `images` (file): Images related to the auction.
        

### Response

The response of this request is a JSON schema representing the structure of the response data.
